üîπ Modul 9: Advanced Exploitation ‚Äì Buffer Overflow v…ô ROP Texnikalarƒ±

  • Stack pivoting, ret2libc v…ô jump-oriented texnikalar (izahlƒ± konseptl…ôr)
  • Exploit development workflow: vuln discovery ‚Üí PoC design ‚Üí safe proof-of-concept reporting (etik yana≈üma)

    üß© Final Project: ‚ÄúCustom Exploit Development & Proof-of-Concept Report‚Äù ‚Äî t…ôl…ôb…ô izolyasiya edilmi≈ü labda bir vulnerable binari tapƒ±r, PoC konseptini hazƒ±r edir, mitigasiya t…ôklifl…ôri v…ô yazƒ±lƒ± raport t…ôqdim edir.
